name: gemini-personal-assistant
description: A browser-based personal assistant using Gemini API, React, and import maps. Firebase is used for backend data storage.

scripts.start: echo "Serve index.html using a static file server. No npm start script needed for this client-side app."
scripts.build: echo "No client-side build step required, uses import maps and direct TSX processing by the browser or a compatible dev server."
